snippet: Tim Griffin, the new director of the Kitchen art gallery and theater in Chelsea, is trying to get his programs back on track after Hurricane Sandy swept in.
abstract: Hurricane Sandy caused extensive damage to the Kitchen, venerable art and performance space in Chelsea, but repairs have been made and executive director Tim Griffin is looking forward to getting back on track.
lead_paragraph: Tim Griffin, the new director of the Kitchen art gallery and theater in Chelsea, is trying to get his programs back on track after Hurricane Sandy swept in.

headline.seo: The Kitchen Dries Out From Hurricane Sandy
headline.main: Drying Out After a Storm, and Moving On
headline.print_headline: Drying Out After a Storm, And Moving On
